Detailed Description

template<class V, class T>
class Collider< V, T >

A Collider is a leaf Node that is used as a collision area.

It is a lightweight Node that can be used to set event areas based on collisions, without the need for any visual information.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

void Collider< V, T >::updateBounds ( ArrayList< SPtr< BoundingVolume< V > > > &  childBounds,
int  from,
int  to 
) [virtual]

Updates this Colliders BoundingVolume, if it has one.

Colliders are leaf nodes, so childBounds will be empty.

Parameters:
childBoundsempty, list of this Node's children
fromnot used
tonot used
